title: I Shouldn't Have Married My Husband
description:
Izabella's husband is a good lover and a good father, but she's unhappy with how self-centered he is and says she'd leave if they didn't have kids. - Dr. Laura: "Be grateful for what you do have instead of resentful for what you don't have."

Do you focus more on what's not perfect or more on what is going well in your life? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
